meanings.sent1: The company's anticompetitive behavior hurt other businesses.
meanings.sent2: The new policy was seen as anticompetitive by industry experts.
meanings.sent3: The anticompetitive tactics of the team made the game less fun for everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her anticompetitive nature in board games always led to intense rivalries.
meanings.sent5: The dark cloud of anticompetitive practices loomed over the market.

meanings.sent1: The anticompetitive regulations stifled innovation in the industry.
meanings.sent2: His anticompetitive attitude made it hard for others to succeed.
meanings.sent3: The anticompetitive cat refused to share its toys with other felines.
meanings.sent4: The anticompetitive mindset was like a barrier to fair play.
meanings.sent5: The anticompetitive spirit of the team was evident in their ruthless tactics.
